titleStmt.title: Articles of accusation and impeachment of the House of Commons, and all the Commons of England against VVilliam Pierce Doctor of Divinitie and Bishop of Bath and Wells.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Parliament. House of Commons.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for George Thomlinson, and are to be sold in the Old-Baily.,

notesStmt.note: The impeachment took place in August 1641.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
